citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 pm to 3:15 pm
on March 2, 2022. During that time the inspectors knocked on doors, called the phone number on file leaving a message,
and left a leave behind flyer on the front door.
Additional Inspectors:
CHRISTINA RADZAI, VETERINARY MEDICAL OFFICEREnd Section

narrative:

A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 1:30 pm to 3:15 pm

and left a leave behind flyer on the front door.
